entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Snow level 1800 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
